brainly_data.question: Answerswhat should you do if you suddenly find yourself in cold water?
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question: Answerswhat should you do if you suddenly find yourself in cold water?
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: If one would find him or herself immerse in cold water then one should have a PFD or life jacket or also curling up in a ball.There are 4 phases of cold water immersion such as the Cold Shock Response, Cold Incapacitation,Hypothermia and Circum-rescue Collapse.

top_answer.question: Answerswhat should you do if you suddenly find yourself in cold water?
top_answer.subject: Biology
top_answer.text: If one would find him or herself immerse in cold water then one should have a PFD or life jacket or also curling up in a ball.There are 4 phases of cold water immersion such as the Cold Shock Response, Cold Incapacitation,Hypothermia and Circum-rescue Collapse.
